questionText: What number comes next in this pattern? 10, 20, 30, 40, ___
You have 3 apples, and your friend gives you 2 more apples. How many apples do you have in total?
What time does this clock show?
Which of these shapes has three sides?
hintForVisual: Picture of a square, circle, triangle, rectangle

questionText: If you sort your toys by color, are you sorting them by size, color, or shape?
What comes next in this pattern? Red, Blue, Red, Blue, Red, ___
Count the number of fingers on two hands.
Which number is bigger: 7 or 4?
You have 5 coins. If you spend 1 coin, how many do you have left?
Which of these is a tally mark for 5?
If you have 5 tens and 7 ones, what number do you have?
There are 25 birds on a tree. 8 birds fly away. How many birds are left on the tree?
What time is it when the big hand is on the 6 and the small hand is between the 2 and the 3?
Which of these objects looks like a sphere?
hintForVisual: Picture of a shoebox, a ball, a soup can, a pyramid

questionText: Which fruit is the most popular?
hintForVisual: A simple bar graph showing favorite fruits: Apples (4), Bananas (6), Oranges (3)

questionText: You have 4 groups of 3 cookies. How many cookies do you have in total?
Which number is even?
If you have two R1 coins and one R5 coin, how much money do you have?
What is 4 times 2?
What is the value of the 3 in the number 345?
A school has 345 boys and 287 girls. How many students are there in total?
What is 7 multiplied by 8?
If a movie starts at 4:15 PM and lasts for 1 hour and 30 minutes, what time will the movie end?
A square playground has sides that are each 10 meters long. What is the total distance around the playground (its perimeter)?
Round 73 to the nearest 10.
What is the rule for this sequence? 5, 10, 15, 20, ...
There are 54 students and they need to be put into groups of 6. How many groups will there be?
How many millimeters are in 1 centimeter?
Which number is greater than 500 but less than 600?
A triangle has 3 sides. If each side is 5cm, what is its perimeter?
A baker makes 125 cakes every day. How many cakes does he make in 5 days?
If you share 96 sweets equally among 8 friends, how many sweets does each friend get?
How many centimeters are in 2 meters?
A rectangular garden is 8 meters long and 5 meters wide. What is its area?
On which day was the temperature the highest?
hintForVisual: A simple line plot showing daily temperatures over a week, e.g., Monday 15°C, Tuesday 17°C, Wednesday 16°C, Thursday 19°C, Friday 18°C

questionText: About how many apples would you have if you round 187 apples to the nearest hundred?
What is the missing number in this pattern? 3, 6, 9, ___, 15
Which of these numbers is a factor of 24?
If you have a container with 2 liters of water, how many milliliters is that?
Which shape has all sides equal and all angles equal?
